attributes.action: Stop laughing in Parliament. You have a very serious job.
attributes.background:
During all moments in Parliament, MPs should act with the highest probety.
The British public, whose lives are being debated, should not see any person of office- especially those in the Cabinet, laughing and joking during any session.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker.
